mapper.insert: insert into app_doctor (id, name, age, level, sex, exprience, image, email, phone, address, hospital, doctor_id, password) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exprience,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_doctor set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exprience = #{exprience,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital = #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, age, level, sex, exprience, image, email, phone, address, hospital, doctor_id, password from app_doctor where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, age, level, sex, exprience, image, email, phone, address, hospital, doctor_id, password from app_doctor
